About ME ...

UWA - IT - Supply Chain - Photography

Arthur Lian

Currently pursuing a Master’s in Information Technology at UWA, I have completed the first semester with a HD average mark and earned the BCG GAMMA Prize for computational data analysis. Holding a Master’s in BA and Supply Chain Mgmt, I bring a strong academic foundation.

I have gained valuable experience in leading global chemical, pharmaceutical, and FMCG companies. Within the supply chain sector, I initiated and contributed to digitalization and data visualization projects elevating departmental efficiency. I am keen on exploring new techs to enhance work efficiency - this passion drives me to pursue further studies in the IT industry.

WORK EXPERIENCE

▼
  • Strategy Assistant (AI & Automation) Intern • Landgate

    • Perth, Australia • February 2024 – Present

    • Responsible for strategy analysis on the trend of AI & Automation. Dig the impacts and changes brought from the new trend to the business operating model and business units.

  • Supply Chain Planner • BASF

    • Shanghai • January 2022 – May 2023 • Greater China & Asia Pacific Head Office

    • Executed End-to-End Supply Chain Planning, overseeing demand forecasting, allocation planning.
    • Initiated the Demand Review Visualization Project, delivered PBI dashboards for 3 product groups.
    • Initiated the Forecast Accuracy Visual Project. Developed an automated Power BI Dashboard to monitor the Forecast Accuracy (FCA) rate.
    • Master data maintenance and data updates.

  • Supply Chain Intern (Project Team) • SANOFI

    • Shanghai • July 2021 – December 2021, April 2020 – December 2020 • Greater China Head Office

    • Assisted Dupixent®️ Launch Project in China. The project shortern the time from IDL to Launch to 25 days, breaking the time record in the field in China.
    • Engaged in Reagents Purchasing Bidding Program. Established a quant criteria model and analyzed quotations for 4 tending suppliers.
    • Participated in Vaccine Traceability Project. Drew comparison and analysis charts for 5 brands loggers and prevented the potential QA risks.
    • WH & TRS cost summarizes for drugs/VXs across all China DCs.

  • Supply Chain Intern (Planning Team) • JOHNSON & JOHNSON

    • Shanghai • January 2021 – June 2021 • China Head Office

    • Participated in Watsons & JNJ VMR (Vendor Managed Replenishment) Project by updating data. Conduct the PBI dashboard UAT.
    • Participated in the Machine Learning Project for FMCG sales forecasting. Collecting, cleansing, and summarizing the data of promotion and others for ML system.
    • Established and completed S&OP (Sales & Operations Planning) Data Maintenance Guide Manual.

    • March 2014 – July 2018
